marklogic.body:
humorous intelligent simple=Correct
MY Simples can change America in a big way A , Fed Fund election--6 months--3 primary 3 general--a debate a week=12=adequate exposure to evaluate candidatesÂ No $$$=O
B. Members of Congress and White House can accept nothing with a Financial Value either current or future.--- keep em on the job Off the road--destroys K St. Bribery Govt no longer for sale.

Our govenrment will then be devoted to doing what is wanted by the people not by the few at he top.
